remarks: Axiom of Quantified Implication.  Axiom C4 of [Monk2] p. 105 and Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  It is restated as ~ alim for labelling consistency.  It should be used only by ~ alim .  (Contributed by NM, 21-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-4 $p |- ( A. x ( ph -> ps ) -> ( A. x ph -> A. x ps ) ) $.
